verses.verse: לְדָוִ֡ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David אֵ֘לֶ֤יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֶקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> 'ek-Ra, Unto thee will I cry צוּרִי֮ <S%H6697><s%> tzu-Ri my rock אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֶּחֱרַ֪שׁ <S%H2790><s%> te-che-Rash to me lest [if] thou be silent מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni at פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- do תֶּֽחֱשֶׁ֥ה <S%H2790><s%> te-che-Sheh not be deaf מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; at וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <S%H4911><s%> ve-nim-Shal-ti, to me I become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- who י֥וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> Yor-dei like them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> Vor. into the pit

שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' Hear ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice תַּ֭חֲנוּנַי <S%H8469><s%> Ta-cha-nu-nai of my supplications בְּשַׁוְּעִ֣י <S%H7768><s%> be-shav-ve-'I when I cry אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha; toward בְּנָשְׂאִ֥י <S%H5375><s%> be-na-se-'I unto thee when I lift up יָ֝דַ֗י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai, my hands אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward דְּבִ֥יר <S%H1687><s%> de-Vir oracle קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> kod-She-cha toward thy holy

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּמְשְׁכֵ֣נִי <S%H4900><s%> tim-she-Che-ni Draw me not away עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with רְשָׁעִים֮ <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im with the wicked וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im- who פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <S%H6466><s%> po-'a-Lei and with the workers אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven of iniquity דֹּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1696><s%> doe-Rei which speak שָׁ֭לוֹם <S%H7965><s%> lom peace עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with רֵֽעֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H7453><s%> re-'ei-Hem; to their neighbours וְ֝רָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> ve-ra-'Ah, but mischief בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Vam. [is] in their hearts

תֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> ten- Give לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem according כְּפָעֳלָם֮ <S%H6467><s%> ke-fo-'o-Lam them according to their deeds וּכְרֹ֪עַ <S%H7455><s%> u-che-Ro-a' and according to the wickedness מַֽעַלְלֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H4611><s%> ma-'al-Lei-Hem of their endeavours כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ke-ma-'a-Seh them after the work יְ֭דֵיהֶם <S%H3027><s%> Ye-dei-hem of their hands תֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ten give לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem; like הָשֵׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> ha-Shev render גְּמוּלָ֣ם <S%H1576><s%> ge-mu-Lam to them their desert לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem. like

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יָבִ֡ינוּ <S%H995><s%> ya-Vi-nu Because they regard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about פְּעֻלֹּ֣ת <S%H6468><s%> pe-'ul-Lot not the works יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- about מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh nor the operation יָדָ֑יו <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav; of his hands יֶ֝הֶרְסֵ֗ם <S%H2040><s%> ye-her-Sem, he shall destroy וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor יִבְנֵֽם׃ <S%H1129><s%> yiv-Nem. them and not build them up

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; [be] the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki-Sha- Because שָׁ֝מַע <S%H8085><s%> ma' because he hath heard ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> ta-cha-nu-Nai. of my supplications

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD עֻזִּ֥י <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Zi [is] my strength וּמָגִנִּי֮ <S%H4043><s%> u-ma-gin-Ni and my shield בּ֤וֹ bo בָטַ֥ח <S%H982><s%> va-Tach trusted לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi, my heart וְֽנֶ֫עֱזָ֥רְתִּי <S%H5826><s%> ve-Ne-'e-Za-re-ti in him and I am helped וַיַּעֲלֹ֥ז <S%H5937><s%> vai-ya-'a-Loz greatly rejoiceth לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi; therefore my heart וּֽמִשִּׁירִ֥י <S%H7892><s%> u-mish-shi-Ri and with my song אֲהוֹדֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3034><s%> a-ho-Den-nu. will I praise

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD עֹֽז־ <S%H5797><s%> 'oz- [is] their strength לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; וּמָ֘ע֤וֹז <S%H4581><s%> u-Ma-'oz strength יְשׁוּע֖וֹת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'ot and he [is] the saving מְשִׁיח֣וֹ <S%H4899><s%> me-shi-Cho of his anointed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה׀ <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-'ah Save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמֶּ֗ךָ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha, thy people וּבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> u-va-Rech and bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Te-cha; thine inheritance וּֽרְעֵ֥ם <S%H7462><s%> u-re-'Em feed וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם <S%H5375><s%> ve-nas-se-'Em, them also and lift them up עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ha-'o-Lam. for ever
